featureDesc: You are mostly aware of your surroundings.
featureBenDesc: Add a +1d4 Awareness bonus to all Physical Ability, Physical Defense, and Base Combat Modifier Rolls.

featureDesc: You have a good sense of what goes on around you.
featureBenDesc: Your Awareness bonus to Physical Ability roll die is now d6.

featureDesc: You have above average sensitivity to your surroundings.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Awareness bonus die to d8.

featureDesc: You are fairly agile and flexible.
featureBenDesc: Add a +1d4 Dexterity bonus to all Physical Ability, Physical Defense, and Base Combat Modifier Rolls.

featureDesc: You have good muscle control and agility.
featureBenDesc: Your Dexterity bonus to Physical Ability roll die is now d6.

featureDesc: You have above average muscle control and agility.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Dexterity bonus die to d8.

featureDesc: You are in fairly good shape.
featureBenDesc: Add a +1d4 Strength bonus to all Physical Ability, Physical Defense, and Base Combat Modifier Rolls.

featureDesc: You have good muscle tone and endurance.
featureBenDesc: Your Strength bonus to Physical Ability roll die is now d6.

featureDesc: You have above average sensitivity to your surroundings.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Strength bonus die to d8.

featureDesc: You have worked to increase your awareness, dexterity, and strength.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Physical Ability die type by one category.

featureDesc: You have worked to make your physical abilites above average.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Physical Ability die type by one category.

featureDesc: You have worked to become an exceptional physical specimen.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Physical Ability die type by one category.

featureDesc: You are friendly and talkative.
featureBenDesc: Add a +1d4 Charisma bonus to all Spiritual Ability, Spiritual Defense, and Base Use Divine Magic Modifier Rolls.

featureDesc: You are an interesting person.
featureBenDesc: Your Charisma bonus to Spiritual Ability roll die is now d6.

featureDesc: You have an above average ability to attract others and hold their attention.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Charisma bonus die to d8.

featureDesc: You hold solid opinions.
featureBenDesc: Add a +1d4 Conviction bonus to all Spiritual Ability, Spiritual Defense, and Base Use Divine Magic Modifier Rolls.

featureDesc: You are a person with strong beliefs.
featureBenDesc: Your Conviction bonus to Spiritual Ability roll die is now d6.

featureDesc: You have an above average ability to hold to your beliefs and opinions.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Conviction bonus die to d8.

featureDesc: You have a solid sense of yourself.
featureBenDesc: Add a +1d4 Individualism bonus to all Spiritual Ability, Spiritual Defense, and Base Use Divine Magic Modifier Rolls.

featureDesc: You have a well defined personality and sense of self.
featureBenDesc: Your Individualism bonus to Spiritual Ability roll die is now d6.

featureDesc: You have an above average grasp of who you are and what you want.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Individualism bonus die to d8.

featureDesc: You have worked to increase your charisma, conviction, and individualism.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Spiritual Ability die type by one category.

featureDesc: You have worked to make your Spiritual abilites above average.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Spiritual Ability die type by one category.

featureDesc: You have worked to become an exceptional Spiritual specimen.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Spiritual Ability die type by one category.

featureDesc: You are able to learn and adapt well.
featureBenDesc: Add a +1d4 Intelligence bonus to all Mental Ability, Mental Defense, and Base Use Arcane Magic Modifier Rolls.

featureDesc: You are quick to learn new things and adapt to new ideas.
featureBenDesc: Your Intelligence bonus to Mental Ability roll die is now d6.

featureDesc: You have an above average ability to learn and apply your learning to new situations.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Intelligence bonus die to d8.

featureDesc: You have a solid ability analyze problems.
featureBenDesc: Add a +1d4 Logic bonus to all Mental Ability, Mental Defense, and Base Use Arcane Magic Modifier Rolls.

featureDesc: You are skilled at problem solving.
featureBenDesc: Your Logic bonus to Mental Ability roll die is now d6.

featureDesc: You have an above average ability to analyze information and solve problems.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Logic bonus die to d8.

featureDesc: You have a solid ability to retain information.
featureBenDesc: Add a +1d4 Recall bonus to all Mental Ability, Mental Defense, and Base Use Arcane Magic Modifier Rolls.

featureDesc: You have a good memory and you know many things.
featureBenDesc: Your Recall bonus to Mental Ability roll die is now d6.

featureDesc: You have an above average ability to gather and retain information.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Recall bonus die to d8.

featureDesc: You have worked to increase your intelligence, logic, and recall.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Mental Ability die type by one category.

featureDesc: You have worked to make your Mental abilites above average.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Mental Ability die type by one category.

featureDesc: You have worked to become an exceptional Mental specimen.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Mental Ability die type by one category.

featureDesc: You have a solid ability to withstand damage.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Total Hit Points by 1d4+1

featureDesc: You have an improved ability to withstand damage.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Total Hit Points by 1d6+2

featureDesc: You have an above average ability to withstand damage.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Total Hit Points by 1d8+3

featureDesc: You have a solid ability to redirect physical damage.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Total Hit Points by 1d4+1

featureDesc: You have an improved ability to redirect physical damage.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Total Hit Points by 1d6+2

featureDesc: You have an above average ability to avoid damage.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Total Hit Points by 1d8+3

featureDesc: You have a solid ability to ignore physical damage.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Total Hit Points by 1d4+1

featureDesc: You have an improved ability to ignore damage.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Total Hit Points by 1d6+2

featureDesc: You have an above average ability to ignore damage.
featureBenDesc: Increase your Total Hit Points by 1d8+3

featureDesc: During an attack action while in Unarmed Combat, you can add +1d4 to your Combat roll.
featureBenDesc: Add +1d4 to your Unarmed Melee Attack combat check roll.
featureNote: If you choose, you may deal Lethal Physical Damage with your successful Unarmed Melee Attacks.

featureDesc: You have learned the basics of armed melee combat.
featureBenDesc: Add +1d4 to your Armed Melee Combat check roll.

featureDesc: You have gained skill in the use of an edged weapon.
featureBenDesc: Add +1 additional damage on a successful attack for any ‘Slashing’ type of Melee Weapon that you use in Melee combat.

featureDesc: You have gained skill in the use of a pointed weapon.
featureBenDesc: Add +1 additional damage on a successful attack for any ‘Impaling’ type of Melee Weapon that you use in Melee combat.

featureDesc: You have gained skill in the use of a blunt force weapon.
featureBenDesc: Add +1 additional damage for any ‘Bashing’ type of Melee Weapon that you use in Melee combat.

featureDesc: You have gained skill in the use of an entagling weapon.
featureBenDesc: Add +1 additional damage for any ‘Lashing’ type of Melee Weapon that you use in Melee combat.

featureDesc: You have learned the basics of armed combat with a ranged weapon.
featureBenDesc: Add +1d4 to your Armed Ranged Combat check roll.

featureDesc: You have gained skill in the use of a bow.
featureBenDesc: Add +1 additional damage for any type of Bow that you use in Ranged combat.

featureDesc: You have gained skill in the ability to hit targets with a thrown weapon.
featureBenDesc: Add +1 additional damage for any type of Thrown Weapon that you use in Ranged combat.

featureDesc: You have learned the basics of defending youself during combat.
featureBenDesc: Add a +1d4 Defense modifier to your Combat check roll.

featureDesc: You have learned how to wear and use various types of “Light” Lesser and Greater armor during combat.
featureBenDesc: You may now use your Melee attack bonus dice while wearing Light Armor in Melee Combat.

featureDesc: You are able to focus more intently on the attacks of one of your opponents in Melee Combat.
featureBenDesc: At the beginning of each round, name a single opponent. Gain an additional +1 Bonus to all Combat Roll Results against the named opponent for that round.

featureDesc: You are now proficient with all buckler and small shields.
featureBenDesc: You can now use your Melee Attack bonus dice while using a small shield in Melee Combat.
featureNote: If you face more than one opponent at a time, you may only use a shield’s Block bonus against one of those opponents each round.

featureDesc: You are quick to act in combat situations.
featureBenDesc: Add +2 a bonus to your Ticker Value at the start of each Combat Encounter.

featureDesc: You gain the extraordinary ability to react to danger before your senses would normally allow you to do so.
featureBenDesc: If you are Surprised, opponents no longer gain a +1d4 bonus on Combat rolls against you.

featureDesc: You have learned to defend yourself while moving past an armed opponent.
featureBenDesc: While in melee combat, you gain a +2 bonus to your Combat roll result against attacks of opportunity made against you while moving through threatened areas.

featureDesc: You have improved your ability to defend yourself while moving past an armed opponent.
featureBenDesc: Your ‘Tactical Mobility’ Defense bonus while moving through threatened areas is now a +5 instead of +2.

featureDesc: You have an advanced ability to defend yourself while moving past an armed opponent.
featureBenDesc: Your ‘Tactical Mobility’ Defense bonus while moving through threatened areas is now a +10 instead of +5.

featureDesc: You have a superior ability to defend yourself while moving past an armed opponent.
featureBenDesc: You may no longer be targeted by attacks of opportunity as long as you are conscious and are not denied your Physical Ability score.

featureDesc: You have an elite ability to defend yourself while in and around armed opponent.
featureBenDesc: Gain an additional +1d4 Mobility bonus to all Combat Check rolls.

featureDesc: You can avoid magical and unusual attacks with great agility.
featureBenDesc: As an extraordinary ability, you now only suffer 1/2 of any normal damage dealt by any magic attack that deals physical damage. You still suffer the full amount of any additional damage.
featureNote: Evade Destruction can only be used if you are wearing lesser armor or no armor.

featureDesc: You have improved your ability to evade unusual attacks.
featureBenDesc: When using Evade Destruction you now suffer only the additional damage from any successful magic attack against you that deals physical damage.
featureNote: Avoid Destruction can only be used if you are wearing lesser armor or no armor.

featureDesc: You have learned to get from getting hit every once in a while.
featureBenDesc: Once per encounter, as a free action while using ‘Focused Combat’, if you are not Stunned, Fatigued, Exhausted, or in some way denied your Physical Ability bonus, you may choose to Dodge a successful normal (not Critical) attack roll against you.  You do not take any damage from this attack.  You may declare your intention to use this ability after the attack against you has been rolled and before damage is resolved.

featureDesc: You are able to defend yourself against some of the damage from a deadly blow.
featureBenDesc: You may choose to use your ‘Dodge Attack’ ability (see above) to reduce the damage dealt to you by a successful melee Critical Hit attack roll against you by 50% (rounded up).

featureDesc: You are able to avoid the damage from a deadly blow.
featureBenDesc: You may choose to use your ‘Dodge Attack’ ability (see above) to ignore all of the damage dealt to you by a single successful melee attack Critical Hit against you.

featureDesc: You may ignore most damage from some successful melee Critical Hits against you.
featureBenDesc: You may now use ‘Dodge Attack’ twice per encounter as long as you are not Stunned, Fatigued, Exhausted, or in some way denied your Physical Ability bonus.

featureDesc: You may ignore most damage from some successful melee Critical Hits against you.
featureBenDesc: You may now use ‘Dodge Attack’ twice per encounter as long as you are not Stunned, Fatigued, Exhausted, or in some way denied your Physical Ability bonus.

featureDesc: You are agile.
featureBenDesc: This Feature gives you a +1d4 Agility bonus to all non-combat Physical Action and Activity roll results for actions that involve physical agility and dexterity.

featureDesc: Your agility is above average.
featureBenDesc: Your Agility increases to 1d6.

featureDesc: Your agility is highly developed.
featureBenDesc: Your Agility increases to 1d8.

featureDesc: You are strong.
featureBenDesc: This Feature gives you a +1d4 Strength bonus to all non-combat Physical Action and Activity roll results for actions that involve muscular strength.

featureDesc: You are stronger than average.
featureBenDesc: Your Feats of Strength bonus is now +2d4.

featureDesc: Your stregth is highly developed.
featureBenDesc: Your Feats of Strength bonus is now +3d4.

featureDesc: You are perceptive.
featureBenDesc: This Feature gives you a +1d4 Awareness bonus to all non-combat Physical Action and Activity roll results for actions that involve sense perception.

featureDesc: You are more perceptive than average.
featureBenDesc: Your Perception increases to +2d4.

featureDesc: Your perception is highly developed.
featureBenDesc: Your Perception increases to +3d4.

featureDesc: You are disciplined.
featureBenDesc: This Feature gives you a +1d4 Discipline bonus to all Action roll results made to maintain concentration while distracted.

featureDesc: You are more disciplined than average.
featureBenDesc: Your Discipline increases to +2d4.

featureDesc: Your discipline is highly developed.
featureBenDesc: Your Discipline increases to +3d4.

featureDesc: You have a well developed memory.
featureBenDesc: Whenever you need to clearly remember a word, name, phrase, or detail you gain a +1d4 Recall bonus to your Mental Action roll result for memory.

featureDesc: Your memory is trained to be better average.
featureBenDesc: Your Memory increases to +2d4.

featureDesc: Your memory is highly trained.
featureBenDesc: Your Memory increases to +3d4.

featureDesc: You like to look around for unusual or new things.
featureBenDesc: Gain a +1d4 bonus to all Mental Activity roll results for Gathering, Research, and Search checks.

featureDesc: You are good at figuring out where things are to be found.
featureBenDesc: Your Investigation increases to +2d4.

featureDesc: It is very difficult to hide things from your keen eye and sharp mind.
featureBenDesc: Your Investigation increases to +3d4.

featureDesc: You can move somewhat quietly and avoid notice when needed.
featureBenDesc: Gain a +1d4 bonus to all Physical Activity roll results for Stealth.

featureDesc: You can be as stealthy as a cat in a dark alley.
featureBenDesc: Your Stealth increases to +2d4.

featureDesc: To most observers, you are no more than a shadow or a wisp of smoke.
featureBenDesc: Your Stealth increases to +3d4.
